name: Shakes
descriptions: Shakes is a protectron robot that functions as a bartender in the Federalist Lounge at Tenpenny Tower in 2277.

Shakes is the Federalist Lounge's robotic bartender, and he dutifully serves drinks twenty-four hours a day, seven days a week. In fact, being a bartender is all Shakes has ever known; he was commissioned by Allistair Tenpenny for that very purpose. Shakes doesn't have much to say, but he can offer discounts on drinks if you know which buttons to press.
Shakes serves only alcohol and stimpaks.

topics.response_text: Welcome to the Federalist Lounge. I'm Shakes. Wet your whistle?{bartender offering a drink}

topics.topic_text: You know anything about those Ghouls trying to get in here?
topics.response_text: Don't you worry about any such thing, sir. Care to wet your whistle?{programmed to be happy}

topics.topic_text: How would you feel about having a few Ghoul neighbors?
topics.response_text: Don't have any data in my files about that.{programmed to be nice}
He is the right lord and master of Tenpenny Tower.
I see, sir. Very well. May I pour you a drink?{programmed to be cheerful}

topics.response_text: Enjoy the holiday discount, compliments of Mister Tenpenny!
